policies.title: Privacy Policy
policies.text_1: By registering on Geonity, you agree that the Ibercivis Foundation collects and processes your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
policies.text_2: We are committed to protecting your privacy and using your information solely to enhance your experience with the application and provide the requested services.
policies.text_3: We will not share your personal information with third parties without explicit consent, except as required by law.
policies.text_4: For more information on how we collect, use, and protect your information, please see our complete Privacy Policy at
policies.accept_text: By pressing the 'Accept' button, you confirm that you have read and understood our Privacy Policy and consent to the processing of your personal data as described.

map.text_3: the screen at the exact point on the map where you want to place the marker
map.text_5: an automatically linked marker will be added to your current position. (The button is located in the bottom right corner of the map).

bottom_tab_nav.title: What would you like to do?

modals.guest_label_2: Sign up or log in to participate in projects and make the most of all available features.

guide_home.title: Welcome to Geonity!
guide_home.subtitle: Next, we will introduce you to the main features of Geonity and how to use them effectively.
guide_home.title2: Create your own projects and organizations
guide_home.subtitle2: To create a project or organization, you should tap the button with the '+' symbol located in the menu at the bottom of the screen. Then, a window will appear where you can select what you want to create.
guide_home.title3: How to participate in a project?
guide_home.subtitle3: Search for the project and go to the project's screen. To view the project map or participate in it, you will have to tap the 'view map' button.
guide_home.subtitle4: To write your biography or upload a profile picture, simply tap the 'edit' button located in the top right corner of your screen.

guide_proyect.title: Project Image, Name, and Description
guide_proyect.subtitle_01: Upload a representative project image along with its name
guide_proyect.subtitle_03: . This will help users easily understand what your project is about.
guide_proyect.subtitle2_01: From this button, you can select the categories that best fit your project. The selected categories will appear at the bottom and you can remove them.
guide_proyect.subtitle2_02: Search bar to add the organization that will appear alongside the project.
guide_proyect.subtitle3: On this screen, you can enable one or more privacy options according to your needs.
guide_proyect.subtitle4_01: Where you can write the question, duplicate it, delete it, and/or mark it as mandatory.
guide_proyect.subtitle4_02: From this button, we can create a new question.
guide_proyect.subtitle4_03: The pop-up window where you can select the type of response according to the question's needs.

guide_organization.title: Organization Images
guide_organization.subtitle: Upload two representative images of your organization. This way, you can visualize in the profile,
guide_organization.subtitle2: Enter the name of your organization, a contact email, and a biography to introduce yourself to the Geonity community.
guide_organization.subtitle3: To add members, type the name of the user you want to include. All members will be added to a list where you can remove them or make them administrators.
